Looking at these durations, the longest is indeed old st paul's cathedral with 356 years. All other entries have shorter periods. Therefore, the claim that it held the title for the longest period is correct.

So, both aspects of the claim are accurate: the duration (356 years) and that it was the longest period among all listed buildings.
